events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your website, but I want to return it because it doesn't fit well. Please advise on how to get a refund.
The customer reports wanting to return a product for a refund due to sizing issues; case categorized under 'Refund'.
Customer assigned to refund specialist team to assist with return and refund process.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out about your jacket return. Iâ€™m here to help you get the refund process started.
Could you please confirm your order number and whether the jacket has been worn or damaged in any way?
Sure, my order number is 54321. The jacket is brand new and unworn, still with tags attached.
Thank you for confirming. You can return the jacket within 30 days using our prepaid shipping label. Once we receive it, your refund will be processed within 5 business days.
That sounds great, thank you for the clear instructions and quick response.
We have emailed you the prepaid shipping label and instructions on how to send back the jacket for a refund.
Just checking in to confirm you received the shipping label and have sent back the jacket. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Refund completed and case closed successfully after receiving returned jacket and processing your payment back.
